ImageMetaTag - Image metadata tagging and presentation¶

All ImageMetaTag source code, unless explicitly stated, is © British Crown copyright, 2015-2016 and is released under a BSD 3-Clause License. The source code and more details of the licence are given on github.

Supported image file formats: png
